properties.name: Toweralia - A tower defense for GDevelop
properties.author: Ulises Freitas<ulises.freitas@gmail.com>

objects.name: txt_controls
objects.string:
Controls:
Use the mouse to drag and drop a tower. Right click a tower to open its upgrade panel

objects.name: txt_credits
objects.string:
Created By 
Ulises Freitas
I hope you enjoyed the game
Thanks

parameters:
"Welcome to the tower defense template, use your mouse to drag and drop towers on the tower locations.
Right-click on a tower to open its upgrade panel, then select an action to take.
You can upgrade the tower, upgrade the bullets and their units, or sell the tower."
"In this area you are going to use archer towers, try to place some towers on the field, so that the archers can stop the incoming enemies."
"Now it's up to the wizards, add a few wizard towers to stop the enemy orde. Also use some archer towers and between them they will be unstoppable."
"You're doing very well, now it's the turn of the melee towers, these towers create a melee-type unit that can slow down enemies, ideal for combining with archers and wizards."

events.comment: Controls the levels of the game for this template only 3 playable levels so the number 6 represents the End scene of the game

parameters: "Wave:" + VariableString(end_stage_counter) + " Enemies killed: " + VariableString(Rankings["Wave:" + ToString(Variable(end_stage_counter))].enemies_killed) + " Enemies escaped: " + VariableString(Rankings["Wave:" + ToString(Variable(end_stage_counter))].enemies_escaped) + NewLine()

events.name: Delete tower buttons depending on the level reached
Select tower and do? upgrade / sell

events.comment: This is just for this template you have to do your own level system logic to send the player to the end of the game.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: westboy, daliyoucefmedakram@gmail.com, @bouh
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Animate the text to simulate it being written character by character (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Useful for dialogue scenes or visual novels.

Add the behavior to a Text object (BBText, Bitmap Text object) and choose the interval between characters.

* When the text changes, the automatic typing starts again from the beginning with the new text.
* You can change the speed of the text typing by changing the interval with events.
* Use a condition to check if the typing finished.
* You can also pause the typing and resume it after.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.fullName: Auto typing animation for texts ("typewriter" effect)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: AutoTyping
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Animate the text to simulate it being written character by character (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Useful for dialogue scenes or visual novels.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Animate the text to simulate it being written character by character (also called "typewriter" effect), with a customizable time between each character. Add the behavior to the object, and it will get animated when the text is changed. You can also pause/resume it.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Text_AutoTyping

eventsFunctions.description: Execute actions when the auto typing text ends.
eventsFunctions.name: TypingFinished

eventsFunctions.description: Detect if the auto typing is on pause.
eventsFunctions.name: TypingPause

eventsFunctions.description: Change the time between characters being typed.
eventsFunctions.name: ChangeInterval
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the interval between characters of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @4ian

eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Allow the object to fire bullets, with customizable speed, angle and fire rate.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: VegeTato, arthuro555
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: Convenience conditions, actions and behaviors for timers to trigger a condition every X seconds.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: RepeatEveryXSeconds
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: This allows to trigger an event every X seconds.

parameters.description: The name of the timer to loop
parameters.name: timerName

parameters.description: The time in seconds between each trigger
parameters.name: time

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers every X seconds X amount of times.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Repeat every X seconds in X number
eventsFunctions.name: RepeatXTimes

parameters.description: The name of the timer to loop
parameters.name: timerName

parameters.description: The time in seconds between each trigger
parameters.name: time

parameters.longDescription: The condition will trigger at most this amount of times. Make it -1 for looping forever.
parameters.name: limit

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Allows to repeat an object timer every X seconds.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RepeatTimer

eventsFunctions.description: Triggers every X seconds, where X is defined in the behavior properties.
eventsFunctions.name: Repeat

eventsFunctions.description: Allows to trigger the recurring timer X times again.
eventsFunctions.name: ResetLimit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Allow to trigger the recurring timer _PARAM1_ of _PARAM0_ X times again

propertyDescriptors.label: The name of the timer to repeat
propertyDescriptors.name: TimerName

propertyDescriptors.label: The time between each trigger (in seconds)
propertyDescriptors.name: TimerLength

propertyDescriptors.label: How many times should the timer trigger? -1 for forever.
propertyDescriptors.name: Limit
